original_text: And as I was considering, behold, an he goat came from the west on the face of the whole earth, and touched not the ground: and the goat had a notable horn between his eyes.
korean_text: 내가 생각할 때에 한 숫염소가 서쪽에서부터 와서 온 지면에 두루 다니되 땅에 닿지 아니하며 그 염소의 두 눈 사이에는 현저한 뿔이 있더라

sentences.original_text: behold, an he goat came from the west
on the face of the whole earth
and the goat had a notable horn
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 염소는 눈에 띄는 뿔이 있었다
